Call this function in a another function to find out the file from which that function was called from. (Inspects the v8 stack trace)

Inspired by http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13227489

 
module.exports = function getCallerFile(_position) {
  var oldPrepareStackTrace = Error.prepareStackTrace;
  Error.prepareStackTrace = function(err, stack) { return stack; };
  var stack = new Error().stack;
  Error.prepareStackTrace = oldPrepareStackTrace;

  var position = _position ? _position : 2;

stack[0] holds this file stack[1] holds where this function was called stack[2] holds the file we're interested in

 
  return stack[position] ? stack[position].getFileName() : undefined;
};
